text: The Alliance of Liberals and Democrats for Europe Party (ALDE Party) is a European political party made of 60 national-level liberal parties from across Europe. The ALDE Party are part of the Liberal International. It was founded on 26 March 1976 in Stuttgart. On 30 April 2004, the ELDR was remade as an official European party, the "European Liberal Democrat and Reform Party" (ELDR Party). ==References== Category:Political parties in Europe
title: Alliance of Liberals and Democrats for Europe Party
